channel.title: swizzle on Thuyen's corner
channel.description: Recent content in swizzle on Thuyen's corner

item.title: Method Swizzling: What, Why and How
item.description: Method swizzling is a very powerful technique that takes advantage of dynamism. The core idea of this technique is to replace the real implementation of a method at runtime. With this power, we could be able to do a lot of cool stuffs. Actually, this special feature is offered by the Objective-C runtime, via message dispatch.
